channel.title: How do i level up quicker?
channel.description: i got a server named tajkillerscape and i can't seem to figure out how too change how quick i train.

@tajkillerscape wrote:

Thanks god and gamma it really helped…

item.title: How do i level up quicker?
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

[quote=“tajkillerscape, post:6, topic:239822”]umm how do i edit this which one?

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; if (exp > 13034430) return 99; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; }[/quote]

go down more and you will see

attack
defence
strength

or some stuff like that, and change exp rate

Read full topic
item.source: How do i level up quicker?

item.title: How do i level up quicker?
item.dc:creator: @GodsChaos GodsChaos
item.description:
@GodsChaos wrote:

double TotalExp = 0; if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) { TotalExp = (double)(5000*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4); } else if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (double)(5000*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID); } else { TotalExp = (double)(5000*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); } TotalExp = (double)(5000*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints); attackTimer = 7;

Thats what mine looks like; like i said, search addSkillXP(( and look for something like5000*hitDiff

Now that is my code, yours is gonna be a different number, but all you have to do is change that number.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i level up quicker?
item.dc:creator: @tajkillerscape tajkillerscape
item.description:
@tajkillerscape wrote:

umm how do i edit this which one?

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; if (exp > 13034430) return 99; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; }

item.title: How do i level up quicker?
item.dc:creator: @GodsChaos GodsChaos
item.description:
@GodsChaos wrote:

In order to do this, you would need to change the amount of exp you get per hit, or exp rate. You can do this by
searching addSkillXP(( in your client.java. After you found this, look for hitDiff, and around there should be a number, like 300, 500 ect… all you have to do is change that number to whatever you want, save then compile your server

Read full topic
